17468.「来てくれたか <pc>よ！\n いつもながら いい時に 現れるな！:
Well, look who's here! You always show up at
the right time!

17469.「これより軍議を 始める！\n 作戦会議室へ 向かってくれ！:
The war council is now in session! War room!
War room!

17470.「三賢人よ。天命の戦乙女の居場所を\n 突き止めることが できたそうだな。:
Three Wise Men. I hear you have managed to
locate the Fate's War Maiden.

17471.「おおっ！！\n ついに この時が来たってのか！: Oh! You mean the time has finally come?

17472.「……どうされた？ 賢人トールよ。\n 顔色が すぐれぬようだが……。:
...What can I do for you? Sage Thor. You look
pale, but...

17473.「………天命の戦乙女は\n 我らのチカラの 遠く及ばぬ地に おられる。:
Fate's War Maiden is in a land far beyond our
reach.

17474.「神々の密約によって 天命の戦乙女は\n 滅びの魔竜へと 引き渡され……\n 今:
By secret agreement of the gods, Fate's War Maiden was handed over to the Demon Dragon of Doom, and now lies at the bottom of the
subterranean world of Nibelheim.

17475.「ち 地底世界ニブルヘイム……！？\n なんということだ……。:
The underworld of Nibelheim...! What a
surprise...!

17478.「天命の戦乙女が 生きておられることが\n 明らかになったのだ。\n これ以上の:
It has been revealed that the Fate's War
Maiden is alive. What could be better news?

17479.「行くぞ！ これより ヴァルハラの戦士は\n 地底世界ニブルヘイムへ向けて 出陣:
Let's go! The warriors of Valhalla now set out
for the underworld of Nibelheim!

17481.「……どうやら 本気のようですな。\n ならば ワシら三賢人が 滅びの魔竜を\n:
It seems he is serious. In that case, I, the
Three Wise Men, will draw the Demon Dragon of
Doom outside of Nibelheim.

17482.「そなたたちは その隙に\n 天命の戦乙女を お救いするのじゃ！:
You will use the opportunity to save the
Fate's War Maiden!

17484.「さあ 行きましょうぞ！\n フレイヤ殿 バルドル殿！: Come on, let's go! Lord Freya, Lord Baldr!

17485.「三賢人よ 恩に着る……！: Three wise men, I owe you.

17486.「巨人族の戦士 <pc>よ！\n 地底世界ニブルヘイムとは この世の果て……\n:
Titan Warrior <pc>! The underworld of
Nibelheim is the end of the world, the world
of those who live in darkness!

17487.「キリカ草原の 北…… キミたち巨人族が\n モリナラ大森林と呼ぶ地の 東部に\:
North of Kirika Steppe... in the eastern part
of what you Titans call the Molinara Forest,
there is a deep, circular strain in the earth.

17488.「その ひずみこそが 地底世界ニブルヘイムと\n この世界をつなぐ ただひとつの:
That strain is the only gateway between the
underworld of Nibelheim and this world. We
march towards it!

17489.「<pc>。ここから先は\n 命をかけた 厳しい戦いに なるだろう！\n それで:
<pc>. From here on out, it's going to
be a hard fight for your life! Still... will
you fight with me?

17490.「ありがとう！ キミなら\n そう言ってくれると思っていた。: Thank you! I knew you would say that.

17491.「さあ ヴァルハラの戦士たちよ！\n <pc>の かばんの中に入るのだ！:
Come, Warriors of Valhalla! Enter into the bag
of <pc>!

17493.かばんの中から シグルドの声が聞こえる。: I hear Sigurd's voice from inside his bag.

17494.「目指すは キリカ草原の 北にある\n モリナラ大森林の 東部だ！\n <pc>:
Our goal is the eastern part of the Molinara
Forest, north of the Kirika Steppe!
<pc>. You're in charge of the move!

17495.「待てっ <pc>！\n どうやら キミは 他にも\n 多くの使命を 抱えている:
Wait <pc>! Apparently, you have many
other missions.

17496.「ならば キミのチカラを\n 借りるわけには いくまい。\n まずは その使命を:
Then we can't ask for your help. First, you
must complete your mission.

17497.「そうか。キミは これまで\n ずいぶん チカラを尽くしてくれた。\n ……責め:
I see. You've done so much for us. I can't say
I blame you.

17498.「だが <pc>よ。\n もしも 気が変わったら いつでも\n このヴァルハラの:
But <pc>. If you change your mind,
come back to Valhalla Hall whenever you like.

17500.「三賢人のチカラにより 天命の戦乙女は\n 滅びの魔竜の住まう 地底世界ニブルヘ:
Through the power of the Three Wise Men, it is revealed that the Fate's War Maiden is imprisoned in the underworld of Nibelheim,
where the Demon Dragon of Doom resides!

17501.「キリカ草原の 北…… キミたち巨人族が\n モリナラ大森林と呼ぶ地の 東部に\:
North of Kirika Steppe... in the eastern part
of what you Titans call the Molinara Forest,
there is a deep, circular strain in the earth.

17502.「その ひずみこそが 地底世界ニブルヘイムと\n この世界をつなぐ ただひとつの:
That strain is the only gateway between the
underworld of Nibelheim and this world. We
march towards it!

17503.「先に出発した 三賢人たちが 滅びの魔竜を\n ニブルヘイムの外に おびきだして:
The Three Wise Men, who have already departed, will lure the Demon Dragon of Doom out of Nibelheim. While they are gone, you must
rescue the Fate's War Maiden!

17504.「<pc>。ここから先は\n 命をかけた 厳しい戦いに なるだろう！\n それで:
<pc>. From here on out, it's going to
be a hard fight for your life! Still... will
you fight with me?

17506.「ここが地底世界 ニブルヘイム……！\n なんと 禍々しい瘴気に 満ちた地だ。\:
This is the underworld of Nibelheim...! What a
land filled with foul miasma! Our Lord, the
Fate's War Maiden, is in a place like this...

17507.「皆 よく聞け！！\n この おそろしい瘴気の中を 我らは進軍する！\n かつて:
Attention, everyone! We are marching into this
terrible miasma! And it will be the hardest
fight you've ever seen!

17508.「しかし 恐れるべきは 死ではない！\n おのれの弱さだ！！\n 戦いに散ってこ:
But it is not death you should fear! It is
your weakness! Only in battle can you fight,
Valhalla's warriors!

17509.「勇敢な 我らの魂は 必ずや\n 神の御許へ 導かれるであろう！！: Brave souls, we will surely be guided to God!

17510.「さあ 行くぞ！！ ボクに続けーー！！！: Let's go, let's go, let's go! Follow me!

17512.「ハァ…… ハァ……。\n シグルド様 申し訳ございません……。\n どうやら:
Huh... huh... sorry Master Sigurd... it
appears that Rijin is only this far.

17514.「この身は……ニブルヘイムの瘴気に\n これ以上 耐えることが できません……。:
My body can no longer withstand the miasma of
Nibelheim and I am no longer able to see.

17515.「私は…… 見とうございました。\n シグルド様の勝利を……。そして……\n 平:
I was eager to see it. I was so proud to see
Sigurd's triumph and the peace he would bring
to the world.

17516.「弱音など…… 弱音など 吐くな！！\n お前に 必ず 見せてやる！！\n ……:
I'll show you what I can do! ...our
victory! Peace!

17517.「くそっ！ しかし この門は……！\n <pc>！！ キミなら 開けられるか！？:
Damn! But this gate...! <pc>! Can you
open it?

17518.<pc>は 門を開こうとした！\nしかし カギが かかっていた。:
<pc> tried to open the gate! But it
was locked.

17519.「くっ……カギが……！ 皆 散れ！！\n この辺りにいる魔物が 門のカギを\n:
The key! Everyone, move out! The monsters
around here must have the key to the gate! We
have to get it!

17520.「リジン！ お前は ここで待っていろ。\n すぐに 門を開けてやる！:
Rijin! You wait here. I'll open the gate right
now!

17521.<pc>は\nニブルヘイムのカギを使って 門を開けた！:
<pc> used the Nibelheim Key to open
the gate!

17522.「おお！ よくやってくれた <pc>！\n 進め！！ 門が 開いたぞーーーー！！:
Oh! Well done <pc>! Move it! The gate
is open!

17523.「さあ リジン！！\n 立つんだ！ 先へ進もう！: Come on, Rijin! Get up! Let's move on!

17524.「おお…… 見えますぞ シグルド様。\n 我が瞳には ハッキリと見えます。\n:
Oh... I see you, Master Sigurd. My eyes see it
clearly. Your victory.

17525.「リジン！？ いったい 何を言って……？\n おい！ しっかりするんだ！！:
Rijin! What the hell are you talking...?
Hey! Stay with me!

17529.「ハ…ハーゲン！？\n まさか…… お前が 私を助けたのか？: Hagen! Don't tell me... you saved me?

17530.「なぜだ ハーゲン！\n 私を嫌っていた お前が なぜ……！？: Why, Hagen! You hated me. Why did you...?

17531.「私は…… あなたに 嫉妬していたのです。\n あ…あなたは 私より…… はるか:
I was jealous of you. You are far superior to
me, the One who should rule over us.

17532.「尊い……？\n<br>\n「私の 何が 尊いというのか！\n ……仲間を助ける:
Precious...? What is so noble about me? ...of
a man who can't even help his own companion!

17533.「フッ……。その言葉も あなたらしい。:
Hmph... those words are also very typical of
you.

17534.「あなたは若い……。それゆえに 戦いの中で\n 多くの痛みを知るでしょう。しかし:
You are young... and therefore will know much
pain in battle. But... one who does not know
pain cannot be a good leader.

17535.「どうか…… 天命の戦乙女を 頼みます。\n 私の魂は 神の御許へ行くのです。\:
Please... the Fate's War Maiden of Heaven, I
beg you. My soul goes to be with God. Wouldn't
that be a joyous occasion...

17536.「行くな……神の御許になど！\n ハーゲン！ ボクには お前が必要なんだ！\n:
Do not go... to God! Hagen! I need you! Don't
go!

17538.「返事をしろ ハーゲン…… ハーゲン！！\n お前まで…………！: Answer me, Hagen... Hagen! You too...!

17539.「リジン…… ハーゲン！ お前たちを失う\n この痛み しかと 我が身に刻み込ん:
Rijin... Hagen! The pain of your loss is
etched into my very soul! I will not let your
deaths be in vain!

17541.「ここが 天命の戦乙女が\n 幽閉されているという ニブルヘイムの底か。:
So this is the bottom of Nibelheim, where the
Fate's War Maiden is said to be imprisoned.

17542.「滅びの魔竜は いねえようですね。\n どうやら 三賢人たちは\n 魔竜を おび:
It seems that the Demon Dragon of Doom is not
here. It seems that the Three Wise Men
succeeded in luring out the demonic dragon.

17544.「やっと あなたに お会いできた……！: It's so nice to finally meet you.

17545.「天命の戦乙女は 気を失われているようだ。\n すぐに 目醒めの術を かけなくて:
Fate's War Maiden seems to have lost her mind.
I must perform the Awakening Jutsu on her
immediately! <pc>! To Valhalla Hall!

17546.<pc>は\nヴァルハラの戦士たち（だいじなもの）と\n天命の戦乙女（だいじなも:
<pc> received
Warriors of Valhalla (Key Item) and
Fate's War Maiden (Key Item)!<me 60>

17547.「お父さま！\n ただいま 風乗りのつとめより 戻りました！:
Father! I've returned from my service as a
wind rider!

17548.「オホン！ おつとめ ご苦労だった……\n と 言いたいところだが フウラよ。:
Oh, yes! I'd like to say thank you for your
service, but I'm Fuura.

17549.「お前の留守中 お前の部屋で\n やたらと 物音がしてな。\n どうも ネズミが:
While you were away, I heard a lot of noises
in your room. Apparently, there are rats in
your room.

17550.「どうせ また 食べこぼしでも\n ほうっておいたんだろう！\n だらしないのは:
I'll bet you spilled some more food on the
floor! You've never stopped being so sloppy!

17551.「な 何よ……… それ？\n 娘が 風乗りのつとめから クタクタで\n 帰ってき:
What's that? My daughter came home from her
windmill service exhausted, and suddenly
you're giving her a lecture?

17553.「私 食べこぼしなんてしてないもん！\n もういいよ！ 私…… 次の\n おつと:
I didn't spill anything! That's enough! I'm
off to the next service! You idiot!

17554.「あっ <pc>さま！\n うわー！ すっごい ひさしぶり！: Ah <pc>! Wow! It's been so long!

17555.「でも…… でも ごめんね！\n 私 気分サイアクなの！ もう行くから！！:
But... but I'm sorry! I'm feeling terrible! I
have to go!

17556.「ヴァルハラの館に 着いたな！\n すぐに 天命の戦乙女に\n 目醒めの術を か:
You have arrived at the house of Valhalla! We
must immediately cast the Awakening Technique
on the Fate's War Maiden!

17557.「……天命の戦乙女よ！ その瞳に 光を！:
Fate's War Maiden! Let light shine in your
eyes!

17558.「な なぜだ！？\n なぜ…… お目醒めにならない？: Why? Why... why won't you wake up?

17559.「いや…… ご安心くだせえ。\n シグルド様の 目醒めの術は\n 確かに 効果が:
No... don't worry. Sigurd's awakening
technique was indeed effective.

17560.「……おそらく ニブルヘイムの瘴気に\n 長時間 アテられちまったために\n 目:
...Perhaps it's because they were exposed to
the miasma of Nibelheim for so long that it's
taking them a while to wake up.

17562.「滅びの魔竜を 外に おびきだした三賢人も\n まだ 戻っていないか……。\n:
The Three Wise Men who lured the Demon Dragon
of Doom outside have not returned yet... and
have grown very quiet. ...

17563.「リジンに ハーゲン……。\n あいつらとの くされ縁も １０年でしたか。:
Rijin, Hagen... it's been 10 years since I've
had an affair with them.

17564.「あいつらは まったく\n 憎たらしくて…… 最低で……\n 本当に…… いいヤ:
They were such a hateful... disgusting...
really... nice...

17565.「死を 恐れるな……。\n ボクはそう言って 戦士たちを率いてきた。\n その結:
I led my warriors with the words, "Don't be
afraid to die. And this is the result.

17566.「死を悼むのは 巨人族だけだと思っていたが\n ボクは…… 仲間を失うということ:
I thought only the Titans mourn death, but I
just didn't know what it was like to lose a
companion.

17567.「ボクに 指導者の資格など なかった。\n ふたりを 死なせたのは このボクだ…:
I was never qualified to lead. I'm the one who
got them both killed.

17568.「そいつは ちげえますよ。\n あいつらは シグルド様のことが好きだから\n 命:
That's not true. They fought for their lives
and scattered because they loved Sigurd.

17570.「<pc>…… キミの役に立つと思って\n ニブルヘイムから持ちかえった 戦利品:
<pc>... I brought back some loot from
Nibelheim that I thought would be useful to
you. Please accept it.

17571.「<pc>。キミは 気づいたか？\n この旅の途中で 我らは\n 調停者オーディ:
<pc>. Did you notice? On this journey
we have heard the voice of Odin the
Mediator...

17572.「世界の終焉が…… 最終戦争が 近づいている。\n まもなく世界は 闇に包まれる:
The end of the world, the final war, is at
hand. Soon the world will be shrouded in
darkness.

17573.「この先は 時間との戦いだ！\n 天命の戦乙女の 目醒めが先か\n 最終戦争が先:
What lies ahead is a race against time! Will
the Fate's War Maiden awaken first or will the
final war come first?

17574.「今はただ 運命を信じて\n 天命の戦乙女の 目醒めを待とう。\n 他に できる:
For now, let us just trust in our destiny and
wait for the awakening of Fate's War Maiden.
There is nothing else we can do.

17575.「<pc>。キミは 気づいたか？\n この旅の途中で 我らは\n 調停者オーディ:
<pc>. Did you notice? On this journey
we have heard the voice of Odin the
Mediator...

17576.「世界の終焉が…… 最終戦争が 近づいている。\n まもなく世界は 闇に包まれる:
The end of the world, the final war, is at
hand. Soon the world will be shrouded in
darkness.

17577.「この先は 時間との戦いだ！\n 天命の戦乙女の 目醒めが先か\n 最終戦争が先:
What lies ahead is a race against time! Will
the Fate's War Maiden awaken first or will the
final war come first?

17578.「今はただ 運命を信じて\n 天命の戦乙女の 目醒めを待とう。\n 他に できる:
For now, let us just trust in our destiny and
wait for the awakening of Fate's War Maiden.
There is nothing else we can do.
